page.title: 08 HENSTRIDGE FARM
page.content: Our farm is 220 acres.We keep mostly dairy, but since milk quotas,we keep a few beef cattle.The farm is all down to grass.We make silage and hay during the summer.We have six tractors which are used for all types of work. We have silage making equipment and hay making equipment, We have three people working on the farm.My granddad dad and my sister. A typical day in the winter.We would get up at 6 oclock.Milk the cows, have brecfast about 9 0clock.Clean up the yard,and feed silage to the cows. do any odd job that need doing have dinner about 1 0clock.Do hedging in the afternoon.Put straw down for cows to lie on.We dont go to any market anything sold goes stright to the slaughte house.
